error.invalid_harbor: Selected harbor is invalid. Please choose from the list.

user.description: Select the harbor and the update frequency.
user.title: Configure Marées France Harbor

confirm.description: Please refresh your browser to see the card in Lovelace editor if you've just installed the integration.
confirm.title: Marées France

init.description: Adjust the update frequency for this harbor.
init.title: Marées France Options

get_water_levels.name: Get Water Levels
get_water_levels.description: Fetches detailed water level heights for a specific harbor and date.

harbor_name.name: Harbor Name
harbor_name.description: The harbor you want the data from.

date.name: Date
date.description: The date for which to fetch water levels (YYYY-MM-DD format).

device_id.name: Harbor
device_id.description: The harbor you want the data from.

get_coefficients_data.name: Get Coefficients Data
get_coefficients_data.description: Retrieves cached tide coefficient data for a specific harbor device. Allows filtering by start date and number of days.

device_id.name: Harbor Device
device_id.description: The Mar√©es France harbor device to get coefficient data for.

date.name: Start Date (Optional)
date.description: The starting date for which to fetch coefficients (YYYY-MM-DD format).

days.name: Number of Days (Optional)
days.description: The number of days (including the start date) to retrieve coefficients for.
